actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals who are participants in employer pension plans a deduction for their contributions to individual retirement plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit employees who are participants in tax qualified pension plans a limited income tax deduction for contributions to an individual retirement account.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals who are participants in employer pension plans a deduction for their contributions to individual retirement plans.
